official_title: A bill to amend title 17 of the United States Code to authorize certain nonprofit use of copyrighted works by volunteer fire companies and rescue squads.

summary.text: Amends the copyright law to permit without infringement of copyright the performance of a nondramatic literary or musical work by a volunteer fire company or rescue squad if the profits are used exclusively for charitable purposes and not for private financial gain.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 17 of the United States Code to authorize certain nonprofit use of copyrighted works by volunteer fire companies and rescue squads.
